author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Big thanks to KiwiCo for sponsoring today’s video! Go to https://www.kiwico.com/tested and use code TESTED for 50% off your first month of KiwiCo.

While visiting Smithsonian's @airandspace Museum recently, Adam Savage stopped by the Futures in Space exhibition to visit an old friend, his R2-D2. Curator Matt Shindell gets the story behind R2's multiyear build -- started when Adam was working at ILM and had access to the original Kenny Baker model -- and explains just how he and his team prepared R2 for its long-term display! Do you have plans to visit R2?

Adam Savage's R2-D2 Finds a New Home: https://youtu.be/7fzegwOGrXw
Adam Builds R2-D2 Parts With ILM Modeler John Duncan! https://youtu.be/6awb5NDrdaw
“Futures in Space” exhibition: https://airandspace.si.edu/whats-on/exhibitions/futures-space
National Air and Space Museum: https://airandspace.si.edu/
More Smithsonian videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJtitKU0CAeiJ7tjkIqcrRPfIYZHPW643

Shot and edited by Joey Fameli
Musi
title: How Adam Savage's R2D2 Was Prepared for Display at Smithsonian
